EntryName	GUC2A_HUMAN
ProteinName	Guanylin (Guanylate cyclase activator 2A) (Guanylate cyclase-activating protein 1) (Guanylate cyclase-activating protein I) (GCAP-I) [Cleaved into: HMW-guanylin; Guanylin]
GeneName	GUCA2A GUCA2
Length	115
Function	Endogenous activator of intestinal guanylate cyclase. It stimulates this enzyme through the same receptor binding region as the heat-stable enterotoxins.
